thread.title: SUPER BOWL 51: Here are the plays and moments everybody will be talking about
thread.title_full: SUPER BOWL 51: Here are the plays and moments everybody will be talking about

author: Cork Gaines
title: SUPER BOWL 51: Here are the plays and moments everybody will be talking about
text:
Kirby Lee/USA Today Sports 
Super Bowl 51 is underway with the New England Patriots taking on the Atlanta Falcons. 
Below, we will track the big plays and big scenes from the game. These are the moments everybody will be talking about on Monday. 
Stars were on hand to root on hand to root on both teams, including Mark Wahlberg and Usher. Patrick Smith/Getty Images Also, 2 Chainz and Harry Connick Jr. Jamie Squire/Getty Images; Gregory Shamus/Getty Images Prior to the game, Fox showed Tom Brady attached to a resistance band being held by a trainer. Of course, the internet had some fun with the visual of "Tom Brady going for a walk." Fox Once Brady was on the field, he was fired up as usual. 
Before kickoff, some of the all-time great NFL players from historically black colleges and universities were honored. Fox The Schuyler Sisters had a small ad lib in "America the Beautiful" and Dan Quinn enjoyed it. 
Luke Bryan sang the national anthem. Tom Pennington/Getty Images
